# AdButler

Serves ads from [AdButler](https://www.adbutler.com/).

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="adbutler"
  data-account="167283"
  data-zone="212491"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please see [AdButler's documentation](http://www.adbutlerhelp.com/amp-configuration).

### Required parameters

-   `width`
-   `height`
-   `data-account`
-   `data-zone`

### Optional parameters

-   `data-place`
-   `data-keyword`
